relation: Latency from time last message processed by component was written to redo to time the message was processed by this component
textBeforeTable: Table 9-7 DBA_HIST_STREAMSMETRIC View This view displays view provides catalog access to streams metric history. DBA_HIST_STREAMSMETRIC: Streams Metric History This view returns all queue metric values over the past hour. It has the same shape as (G)V$QUEUEMETRIC: Queue Metrics for the Most Recent Interval. (G)V$QUEUEMETRIC_HISTORY: Queue Metrics Over Past Hour Current number of messages in the queue NUMBER NUM_MESSAGES Number of messages spilled per second NUMBER SPILLED_PER_SECOND Number of messages enqueue per second NUMBER ENQUEUED_PER_SECOND Time when queue started DATE QUEUE_START_TIME Name of queue VARCHAR2(32) QUEUE_NAME Interval size (centi-seconds) NUMBER
textAfterTable: DBA_HIST_QUEUEMETRIC: Queue Metric History This view displays view provides catalog access to queue metric history. Table 9-8 DBA_ATTRIBUTE_TRANSFORMATIONS View Column Datatype Description SNAP_ID NUMBER Required by AWR, snapshot ID DBID NUMBER Required by AWR, database ID INSTANCE_NUMBER NUMBER Required by AWR, instance number QUEUE_NAME VARCHAR2(32) Name of queue process
